name: S4ST3M DELAY
description:
Match the Target Voltage to Keep the Robot Alive

Left Mouse Button to drag 'n' drop the batteries into the battery holders
Right Mouse Button to flip batteries
A flipped battery has a negative voltage
All battery holders must be occupied to complete the circuit

Try to beat MagmaLeaf's score of 42!

Made for TriJam #82
Theme: Delay

Artist: MagmaLeaf
Programmer: JafCraze
Engine: Godot
